main.description: Definition of a PackableSample-compatible sample type. Supports versioning via rkey format: {NSID}@{semver}. Schema format is extensible via union type.

name.description: Human-readable display name for this sample type. Used for documentation and UI. The NSID in the record URI provides unique identification; name collisions across NSIDs are acceptable.

schemaType.description: Type of schema definition. This field indicates which union member is present in the schema field.

schema.description: Schema definition for this sample type. Currently supports JSON Schema Draft 7. Union allows for future schema formats (Avro, Protobuf, etc.) without breaking changes.

description.description: Human-readable description of what this sample type represents

metadata.description: Optional metadata about this schema. Common fields include license and tags, but any additional fields are permitted.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when this schema version was created. Immutable once set (ATProto records are permanent).

$atdataSchemaVersion.description: Format version discriminator for the schema record itself. Used to detect breaking changes in the record structure. When absent, treated as version 1 for backward compatibility.

schemaMetadata.description: Open metadata object for schema records. Common fields include license and tags. Applications may extend with additional fields.

license.description: License identifier or URL. SPDX identifiers recommended (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0, CC-BY-4.0) or full SPDX URLs (e.g., http://spdx.org/licenses/MIT). Aligns with Schema.org license property.

tags.description: Categorization keywords for discovery. Aligns with Schema.org keywords property.

jsonSchemaFormat.description: JSON Schema format for sample type definitions. The content field holds the actual JSON Schema document (Draft 7+). This envelope separates ATProto protocol fields from JSON Schema's $-prefixed fields.

content.description: JSON Schema object (e.g., Draft 7). Contains the full schema including $schema, type, properties, etc. Stored as opaque data to avoid $-prefix collisions with ATProto reserved fields.

arrayFormatVersions.description: Mapping from array format identifiers to semantic versions. Keys are science.alt.dataset.arrayFormat values (e.g., 'ndarrayBytes'), values are semver strings (e.g., '1.0.0'). Canonical shim schemas are maintained at https://json-schema.alt.science/atdata-{format}/{version}/.
